full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM LA GTOR MA 'BUL TSUL DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES DAM CAN GSHIN RJE RGYAL PO PHYI NANG GSANG GSUM LA MCHOD GTOR 'BUL BA'I RIM PA DNGOS SU CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI RIGS RUS PHUN SUM TSOGS SHING DAD PA DANG GTONG BA'I RGYAN GYIS, ,MDZES PA'I BKRA SHIS DBANG GI DPON MO CHE BA DANG, LUGS GNYIS LA MKHYEN PA'I SPYAN LDAN TSE RING AA KE'I GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR DZA YA PAndI TAS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI CHOS LA BLO MIG RGYAS PA AU LEM CI PI LIG MTHU DGE SLONG NGO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
